title: Quick System Info Wear
developerAddress:
1210 Sierra Village Way
San Jose, CA 95132
description: Quick System Info now comes to your wearable devices!** Note this app is for your wearable devices ONLY, you will see the app from your wearable devices after install and syncing, NO launchable app on your handheld devices**Quick access of the basic system information for your Android platform, including information for CPU, memory, SD Card, running processes, network states and installed applications. * Live CPU/MEM Usage Monitor* Live 2G/3G/Wi-Fi Traffic Monitor* Comprehensive Device/Hardware Details Viewer, e.g. Storage/Memory/Processor/Sensor/Network* One-click Application Cache Cleaner* Application History Cleaner* Advanced System Properties Viewer, e.g. System/Phone/Screen/OpenGL/Build and Runtime Settings* Enhanced Application Viewer with Tag and Backup/Restore support* Enhanced Process Management and Viewer* Enhanced Network Connection and Traffic Viewer* Enhanced Battery Status in Notification Area.** The 'read/write bookmark' permission is needed for the 'Clean History' function only **
descriptionHTML:
Quick System Info now comes to your wearable devices!

** Note this app is for your wearable devices ONLY, you will see the app from your wearable devices after install and syncing, NO launchable app on your handheld devices**

Quick access of the basic system information for your Android platform, including information for CPU, memory, SD Card, running processes, network states and installed applications.

* Live CPU/MEM Usage Monitor
* Live 2G/3G/Wi-Fi Traffic Monitor
* Comprehensive Device/Hardware Details Viewer, e.g. Storage/Memory/Processor/Sensor/Network
* One-click Application Cache Cleaner
* Application History Cleaner
* Advanced System Properties Viewer, e.g. System/Phone/Screen/OpenGL/Build and Runtime Settings
* Enhanced Application Viewer with Tag and Backup/Restore support
* Enhanced Process Management and Viewer
* Enhanced Network Connection and Traffic Viewer
* Enhanced Battery Status in Notification Area.

** The 'read/write bookmark' permission is needed for the 'Clean History' function only **
comments: Doesn't appear to work for Garmin Devices.
